languages.text: "Император милостив, раз дал тебе шанс на искупление".

traits.locale_text: "Император милостив, раз дал тебе шанс на искупление".

languages.text: "The Emperor is merciful for allowing you a chance at redemption."

languages.text: “仁慈的帝皇给了你赎罪的机会。”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor is merciful for allowing you a chance at redemption."

traits.locale_text: “仁慈的帝皇给了你赎罪的机会。”

languages.text: «Que el Emperador le conceda una oportunidad de redención demuestra su magnanimidad».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor is merciful for allowing you a chance at redemption."

traits.locale_text: «Que el Emperador le conceda una oportunidad de redención demuestra su magnanimidad».

languages.text: 「贖罪の機会を与えてくださった皇帝は、なんと慈悲深いことか」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor is merciful for allowing you a chance at redemption."

traits.locale_text: 「贖罪の機会を与えてくださった皇帝は、なんと慈悲深いことか」

languages.text: "Es war gnädig vom Imperator, Euch eine Chance auf Erlösung zu gewähren."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor is merciful for allowing you a chance at redemption."

traits.locale_text: "Es war gnädig vom Imperator, Euch eine Chance auf Erlösung zu gewähren."

languages.text: « L'Empereur est généreux de vous avoir laissé une chance de vous racheter. »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor is merciful for allowing you a chance at redemption."

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur est généreux de vous avoir laissé une chance de vous racheter. »

languages.text: "İmparator sana merhamet edip günahlarını telafi etme fırsatı vermiş."
languages.original_text: "The Emperor is merciful for allowing you a chance at redemption."

traits.locale_text: "İmparator sana merhamet etmiş ve günahlarını telafi etme şansı vermiş."
